name: 楊勝明
objective: 本課程的目的: 熟悉各種轉換器電路的原理, 學習轉換器電路設計實務, 學習電子電路製作, 實驗驗證轉換器的功能。
schedule:
1.  Introduction, 分組
2.  Introduction of laboratory equipment
3.  Lab 1: AC-DC converter, Bridge rectifier
4.  Lab 2: Boost DC-DC converter Design, Circuit schematic
5.  Boost converter circuit layout and manufacturing (Lab2測驗)
6.  Experiments
7.  Lab 4: Flyback DC-DC converter
8.  Experiments (Lab4測驗)
9.  Mid-Exam week
10. Lab 5: Boost PFC
11. Experiments, (Lab5測驗)
12. Introduction of Arduino
13. Lab 6: Full-bridge DC-DC converter
14. Experiments, (Lab 6測驗)
15. Lab 7: Full-bridge DC-AC inverter
16. Unipolar and Bipolar PWM
17. Buck DC-DC converter design
18. Final exam. week
scorePolicy:
實驗 (上課時檢查)：40%
實驗報告：20%
Exam：40% (5次測驗)
materials:
上課講義: 北科i學園
Reference: "Power Electronics", Daniel Hart, McGraw Hill, 東華
